documents.name: Privacy Policy
documents.text: Everforo is the next generation of online community groups. Everforo gives you the power to choose how to manage and store your community content, and the privacy of you and your members. Everforo makes this possible through the use of blockchain technology that is simple, seamless, and behind the scene.

points.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
points.status: They can change the terms of service any time they see fit, even without notification to the user. Your use of the service supposedly constitutes acceptance of the changes in the terms.

points.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
points.status: From http://www.freeforums.org/tos.php: "FreeForums.org reserves the right to change the terms, conditions, and notices at any time, and such modifications shall be effective immediately upon posting of such changes."
points.quoteText: We reserve the right to update or modify these Terms and Conditions at any time, and without prior notice to you.
